Key Match Events: India under Shubman Gill will play the next T20I on Sunday at 4:30 PM at the same venue.

Sikandar Raza and Tendai Chatara for Zimbabwe has picked up three wickets each to defend the lowest total ever against India and take a 1-0 lead in the first of five-match T20I series at Harare Sports Club in Harare on Saturday.
